evidence.text:
Person B: Who are you?
Person B: And I'll ask you again... who the fuck are you?

Person A: Enough. One of you call Ivan, now.
Person A: If you aided him in this fraud of a marriage, then it is your business.

Person A: Give me your phone, you little fuck.
Person B: I don't think so.
Person A: Call Ivan now or my friend here is going to practice his stroke on your fucking face.
